entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
